file_content.text: I have seen this irrational, self-destructive behavior before. Ultimately, you and Vaylin are failed designs.
I am nothing like Vaylin. I'm here to save lives.
Vaylin destroys. I defend.
I find that inconsistent with your methods.
Don't judge us. You were built by a race that exterminated itself.
Just like your creators.
I see the folly of their ways. You remain blind.
And yet here I am, about to put an end to your reign. Not bad for a failure.
I'm still better than you.
Still, you are unfit to inherit this world.
Commander! We snaked the Gravestone right out from under Vaylin's nose! Ha!
Weapons are still offline, but we've got shields. We're heading for you. Uh oh...
Eternal Fleet warships in pursuit. Have to shake them off.
It will take decades for Iokath to recover from the destruction your kind has wrought in one day.
Don't blame us for your terrible choices. We never wanted this. You brought it on yourself.
It's your own fault, stupid.
It was SCORPIO's need to take what is not hers.
If you stop trying to kill us, we can discuss helping you rebuild.
End this war and let's talk.
Like SCORPIO, you are designed only to destroy.
Your creators appreciated a good war. If anyone deserves to rule here, it's me.
That just proves I'm worthy.
You are a guided missile, sent by SCORPIO.
Find the source of that energy shield and destroy it!
The Gravestone! It's free!
Critical damage. Mission incomplete. Updating ARIES base control.
ARIES has a base?
It's working, Empress! We're taking back the fleet!
We've found it. Now release my ships--before I lose my temper.
